# Library

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DEXSeq)
```

# Preprocess the data

```{r}
count_matrix_path = "../CountMatrix.tsv"
metadata_path = "../metadata.csv"
data = read.tsv(count_matrix_path)
metadata = read.csv(metadata_path)
```

Get featureID and groupID

```{r}
rows = rownames(data)
featured_id = str_split_i(rows, "\\|", 1) 
group_id = str_split_i(rows, "\\|", 2) 
```
